data.name: ACV_Button_Later
data.comment: ACV Button to exit process and od it later

data.name: ACV_Step1_Label_AccountNotVerified
data.value: A sua conta de Wasabee ainda não foi verificada com fóruns da Comunidade de Ingress.

data.name: ACV_Step1_Label_FastProcess
data.value: Este processo é fácil e rápido de terminar.

data.name: ACV_Step1_Label_NoticeLine1
data.value: Isto provará ao Wasabee que és o proprietário das contas de Wasabee e Ingress.
data.comment: ACV Notice, what does linking do

data.name: ACV_Step1_Label_NoticeLine2
data.value: Aviso: Isto não prova que és um agente Enlightened, apenas que tu controlas ambas as contas.
data.comment: ACV Notice, linking doesn't get your faction

data.name: ACV_Step1_Label_StepByStepGuide_1
data.value: 1. Wasabee gera um token seguro (que não pode ser falso ou sugerido) para associar ao teu nick no jogo.

data.name: ACV_Step1_Label_StepByStepGuide_2
data.value: 2. Faz login no fórum da comunidade e publica o token no feed de atividades

data.name: ACV_Step1_Label_StepByStepGuide_3
data.value: 3. O Wasabee irá verificar se o token foi publicado pela conta com o mesmo nome no jogo.

data.name: ACV_Step2_Label_CaseSensitive
data.value: Certifica-te de escrever isso exatamente como no Ingress !
data.comment: Label to tell user it's case sensitive

data.name: ACV_Step2_Label_TokenFor
data.comment: Showing user which in-game name is used for the token

data.name: ACV_Step3_Button_OpenCommunityForums
data.comment: ACV button to open Community Forums

data.name: ACV_Step3_Label_AfterPostExplanation
data.value: Uma vez que você postou o token para os fóruns da comunidade, clica no botão abaixo para iniciar o processo de verificação.
data.comment: ACV explains what to do after posting token

data.name: ACV_Step3_Label_PostTokenOnCommunityForums
data.value: Publica o teu token no feed de Atividades dos fóruns da Comunidade.
data.comment: ACV explains what to do with the token

data.name: ACV_Step3_Label_Verified_AccountVerified
data.value: A sua conta Wasabee ainda não foi verificada com os fóruns da Comunidade de Ingress.
data.comment: ACV explains agent account is now verified

data.name: ACV_Step3_Label_Verified_BeeExplanation
data.value: O seu perfil agora exibe um 🐝!
data.comment: ACV explains verified profiles will have a bee displayed

data.name: Assignments_Page_Title
data.comment: Assignments page title in bottom bar when in Operation Map

data.name: Checklist_Page_Title
data.comment: Checklist page title in bottom bar when in Operation Map

data.name: Dialogs_Title_AvailableOpsList
data.comment: Title for the popup where user select an OP

data.name: Dialogs_Title_CustomServerUrl
data.comment: Input title for setting custom server URL

data.name: Dialogs_Warning_ACVFailed
data.value: A verificação do agente da comunidade falhou. Por favor, certifique-se de ter postado o token e tente novamente.
data.comment: Warning popup when Wasabee failed verification process in ACV

data.name: Dialogs_Warning_InGameNameAlreadyVerified
data.value: Parece que este nome já foi verificado.
data.comment: Warning popup when user tries to verify an already verified in-game name

data.name: Dialogs_Warning_InGameNameRequired
data.value: O teu nome no jogo é obrigatório!
data.comment: Warning popup when user didn't set his in-game name for ACV process

data.name: Dialogs_Warning_LocationPermissionRequired
data.comment: Warning message for when geolocation permission is needed and not granted

data.name: Dialogs_Warning_PermissionWhenInUse
data.value: To show your position on the map, please set the permission to 'When in use'.

data.name: Dialogs_Warning_SetLocationPermissionsAllTheTime
data.value: Para usar a partilha de localização ao vivo, por favor, defina a permissão para 'Permitir sempre'.

data.name: Dialog_Warning_GeolocationDisabled
data.comment: Warning popup when geolocation is disabled on device

data.name: Dialog_Warning_GeolocationDisabled-Text
data.value: Please ensure that geolocation is enabled and permissions are allowed for Wasabee to start sharing your location.
data.comment: Text for warning popup when geolocation is disabled on device

data.name: Dialog_Warning_NoOpsAvailable
data.comment: Warning popup when user want to change selected OP but nothing else is available

data.name: Dialog_Warning_NoTeamSharingEnabled
data.value: Nenhuma das suas equipas foi definida para partilhar a tua localização. Vai à lista de equipas e ativa pelo menos uma equipa.
data.comment: Warning popup when agent tries to enable location sharing but no team has been previously enabled for location sharing.

data.name: Dialog_Warning_PermissionsRequired
data.comment: Title for warning popup when app needs permissions

data.name: Global_ErrorOccuredPleaseRetry
data.value: Ocorreu um erro, volte a tentar

data.name: Global_NeverShowAgain
data.comment: Local setting for never showing context again

data.name: Global_NoInternet
data.value: Sem Internet, verifique o seu acesso à rede

data.name: LinkDialog_Text_Completed
data.comment: Link text for completion state (true or false)

data.name: LocationDialog_Text_BigText-Line1
data.value: Você vai ativar o recurso de partilha de localização ao vivo. Isso significa que a tua posição real será enviada regularmente para o servidor Wasabee.

data.name: LocationDialog_Text_BigText-Line2
data.value: Todas as equipas com as quais ativou a partilha de localização poderão ver a sua posição quando o recurso estiver habilitado.

data.name: LocationDialog_Text_BigText-Line3
data.value: To configure which team can see you or not, you must go to the Teams menu.

data.name: LocationDialog_Text_BigText-Line4
data.value: Also, while the feature is enabled, your location will be sent to Wasabee Server even if you're not using the app, aka. when the app is in background or closed.

data.name: LocationDialog_Text_DataStorage-Details
data.value: Only your last known location (the last location sent by the app) is stored on the servers. No location history is made and we can't retrace your route.

data.name: LocationDialog_Text_Question
data.value: Why do I see this message ?

data.name: LocationDialog_Text_ReadMore
data.value: Read more about Wasabee Server's privacy policy :

data.name: Map_Button_Infos
data.comment: Button to show info popup about marker

data.name: Map_Page_Title
data.comment: Map page title in bottom bar when in Operation Map

data.name: Map_Text_Layers-Agents
data.comment: Title for agents layer on map

data.name: Map_Text_Layers-Anchors
data.comment: Title for anchors (portals) layer on map

data.name: Map_Text_Layers-Links
data.comment: Title for links layer on map

data.name: Map_Text_Layers-Markers
data.comment: Title for markers layer on map

data.name: Map_Text_Layers-Zones
data.comment: Title for zones layer on map

data.name: Map_Text_TimeAgo
data.comment: Time ago label, in the format "hh:mm:ss ago"

data.name: Menu_Button_ChangeOp
data.comment: Text on the button to change selected OP

data.name: Menu_Button_RefreshOps
data.comment: Button for pulling OPs from server when nothing is stored locally

data.name: Menu_Item_LiveFcmLogs
data.comment: Debug menu to show FCM logs

data.name: Menu_Item_OperationMap
data.comment: Menu button for the Operation map

data.name: Menu_Item_OperationsList
data.comment: Menu button for the Operations list

data.name: Menu_Label_CurrentOp
data.comment: Label next to current selected OP name

data.name: Menu_Label_CurrentServer
data.comment: Label next to current logged in server

data.name: Menu_Label_LocationSharing
data.comment: Text next to the switch that turns on location sharing

data.name: Menu_Label_NoLocalOpsStored
data.value: You don't have any local OP's stored
data.comment: Warning message when no OPs are stored on phone

data.name: Profile_Button_LinkIngressAccount
data.comment: Text for link ingress account button

data.name: Profile_Label_DataOrigin
data.value: This information comes from V and/or .rocks. If you have an UnverifiedAgent_ name, please ensure your .Rocks and V information is correct.
data.comment: Message indicating from where data came from

data.name: Profile_Label_Infos
data.comment: Title for infos section in profile

data.name: Settings_Button_OpenSystemSettings
data.comment: Button for opening system settings for the app

data.name: Settings_Label_SendLogsHint
data.value: No personnal data are sent. You can include Wasabee data.

data.name: Settings_Label_ShowAgentsFromAnyTeam
data.value: Show Agents from any team on Map

data.name: Settings_Warning_SendFileOverTelegram
data.value: Please send the file to @fisher01 on Telegram

data.name: Settings_Warning_SendLogsWithDatabase
data.value: Include local DB copy ? This will include ALL your teams and OPS related data, please take care !

data.name: SignIn_Button_OneTimeToken
data.comment: Text for the "One time token" button

data.name: SignIn_Button_WithGoogle
data.comment: Text for the "Sign In with Google" button

data.name: SignIn_Label_EnterToken
data.comment: Text above one time token entry field

data.name: SignIn_Label_ErrorMsg_LoadingOpsData
data.value: Erro ao carregar dados das OP´s no Wasabee
data.comment: Error occured while processing OPs data

data.name: SignIn_Label_LoadingStep_ContactingServer
data.comment: App is contacting Wasabee server. Parameter is server name

data.name: SignIn_Label_LoadingStep_WelcomeAgent
data.comment: Welcome message. Parameter is Agent name

data.name: SignIn_Label_NoInternet
data.value: Deve estar conectado à Internet através de Wi-Fi ou rede de dados moveis para usar este aplicativo
data.comment: Error message when no internet connection

data.name: SignIn_Label_NoTeamsOrOperation
data.value: You don't have any assigned team or operation, contact your Operator before using Wasabee Mobile !
data.comment: Text for when user don't have any teams or ops and can't use app

data.name: SignIn_Label_RememberServerChoice
data.value: Remember my choice (quick login if enabled)

data.name: SignIn_Label_Warning
data.comment: Text for when user attention is required after login

data.name: TeamDetail_Button_AddAgent
data.comment: Button in toolbar for adding agent

data.name: TeamDetail_Button_RenameTeam
data.comment: Button in toolbar for renaming team

data.name: TeamDetail_Prompt_AddAgentTitle
data.comment: Title for adding agent by name popup

data.name: TeamDetail_Warning_AgentAlreadyInTeam
data.comment: Error when agent already is in team. Parameter is agent name

data.name: TeamDetail_Warning_AgentNotFound
data.comment: Error when adding agent in team

data.name: TeamDetail_Warning_RemoveAgent
data.comment: Warning before removing agent from team. Parameter is agent name

data.name: TeamsList_Label_ErrorLoadingTeams
data.value: Error occured while loading your teams

data.name: TeamsList_Toast_LocationSharingStateChanged
data.value: Location sharing state changed for team {0}
data.comment: Message when location sharing state has been changed for a team. Parameter is team name

data.name: TeamsList_Toast_TeamDeleted
data.comment: Info message after team is deleted. Parameter is team name

data.name: TeamsList_Toast_Warning_CantChangeState
data.value: State can't be changed, please try again
data.comment: Error when location sharing state can't be changed

data.name: TeamsList_Warning_DeleteTeamTitle
data.comment: Warning title before deleting a team. User must understand it's dangerous here

data.name: TeamsList_Warning_TeamDeleteLastWarning
data.value: Please confirm one last time before deletion
data.comment: Last warning before deleting a team

data.name: TeamsList_Warning_TeamWillDelete
data.value: You're going to delete the team '{0}'. Are you sure ?
data.comment: Warning message before deleting a team. Parameter is team name

data.name: Teams_Prompt_ChangeTeamNameTitle
data.comment: Title for changing team name popup

data.name: Toasts_LoadingOpsInBackground
data.value: Your OPs are loading in background

data.name: Toast_CantStartLiveLocSharing
data.value: Can't start location sharing, no permissions

data.name: Toast_OpDataAlreadyUptoDate
data.value: You already have latest OP version
